name: A Convention.
description:
Dark times in Blackandwitengton. I mean, everything there is made of every shade of gray, so obviously are dark times. By the way, our blue friend Mr. Blue Cube needs a hug even if the rectangular Other Guys are terrified by the idea of only touching him. Will you help him to get a hug?

---

CONTROLS:

CLICK ON MR. BLUE CUBE TO START 

A/D to MOVE

W to INTERACT

---

This game was made in approximately 3 days for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 107. The jam's theme was "Don't Touch It". This is the first time ever that I go rogue in a jam and it is also my first game ever made with Unity. I know there is a lot of work to do, but if you enjoyed even just a little thing in this game, please tell me in order to continue the work on this, adding a lot of new levels and a deeper storyline!

Thanks for playing :)
